webpage.para: This test page demonstrates how to incorporate RDDL into your web pages.
To apply RDDL resources to inline elements, just wrap the rddl:resource element around them.

section.title: Out Of Line RDDL
section.para: Apply RDDL to an entire section requires an out of line RDDL resource. (Allowing rddl:resource elements to wrap sections would interrupt the structure of the document more than I'm willing to allow.)

listitem.para: Put an empty rddl:resource element in the head of your webpage.
Assign an ID value to the rddl:resource.
Refer to the ID of the rddl:resource with the rddl attribute on section.

section.para: The stylesheets will wrap the rddl:resource around the section in the resulting HTML.
